name: aad-export-compare-conditional-access-policies
title: Export & Compare Conditional-Access Policies (drift-detect)
shortDescription: This script exports Conditional Access Policies to JSON, stores them for version control, and detects changes between runs.
longDescription: This script automates the export and comparison of Conditional Access Policies within an Azure AD tenant to detect configuration drift. It helps monitor changes to these critical security controls over time, ensuring they remain compliant with your organization's zero-trust baselines.
